description: Record daily water intake and track
recordWater: Record daily water intake and track
editWaterAmount: Edit the entered amount of water
enterWaterValue: Enter the value of the water used:
formulaExplanation: V is the volume of the water norm in liters per day, M is your body weight, T is the time of active sports, or another type of activity commensurate in terms of loads (in the absence of these, you must set 0)
activeSportsTime: The time of active participation in sports:
requiredWaterAmount: The required amount of water in liters per day:
recordWaterIntake: Write down how much water you will drink:
confirmDeleteEntry: Are you sure you want to delete the entry?
confirmLogout: Do you really want to leave?
